content: In terms of the income statement, our total revenues improved to 46% year-over-year to RMB39.8 billion in the fourth quarter and 39% year-over-year to RMB130.6 billion for the full year of 2022. And my second question is actually related to the revenue, your online marketing service revenue grew 38% year-over-year last quarter ahead of the industry growth and peers, but at the same time, we have seen this withstand a deceleration from the third quarter. And my second question is about sales and marketing, which we saw a acceleration in sales and marketing expenses of 56% year-over-year to around RMB18 billion in the fourth quarter.
